faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about AI Studio

items.question: What is AI Studio?
items.answer: AI Studio is a comprehensive AI platform that helps businesses and developers integrate intelligent features into their workflows and applications. Our tools include AI assistants, document processing, image generation, and API services.

items.question: How does the pricing work?
items.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans starting with a free tier for basic usage. Our Pro plan includes advanced features and higher usage limits, while Enterprise plans are customized to your specific needs. All plans are billed monthly with no hidden fees.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, we take security seriously. We use bank-grade encryption, implement strict access controls, and comply with industry security standards. Your data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.

items.question: Do you offer technical support?
items.answer: Yes, all plans include some level of support. Free tier users have access to community support, Pro users get priority email support, and Enterprise customers receive 24/7 dedicated support with SLA guarantees.

items.question: Can I try before subscribing?
items.answer: Yes! You can start with our free tier which includes basic features and API calls. This allows you to test our services and see how they fit your needs before upgrading to a paid plan.
